page.title: 11MAY 1st-PADSTOW 'OBBY 'OSS
page.content: On{May Day}morning I get up early and get dressed{completely in white,}then I put on my{red scarf and ribbons} (because I support the Old 'Oss) next I pin on my buttonhole of{bluebells {and cowslips}then I go down to the town.I look at the{maypole}with its twirling flowers then join my friends with the{Children's 'Oss.}We buy water pistols and squirt the followers of the{Peace 'Oss}dressed in{blue scarves {and ribbons.}Then I hear the sound of the{accordions and drums}of the Big 'Oss and we follow it around the town, in and out the pubs (I drink lots of coke and eat crisps),and go up to Prideaux Place.I also go to the fair with my friends.We follow the Big 'Oss again until it is very late then we go home to bed with the sound of the music still playing in our heads.
